description:
Replacement hook for your Velo Hinge bike rack that makes it compatible with your deep dish rims and wide mountain bike tires.

  • Vinyl coated hook
  • Powder coated steel
  • Load capacity is 50lbs (23kg)
  • Will accommodate 2.4in. (61mm) wide tires and a maximum height of 99mm from the inside of the rim to the top of the tire
name: Feedback Sports Velo Hinge - Long Hook
